column4: hello, is Ubuntu the easiest distro of Linux to start learning Linux on ?
are there any video tut's out there on Linux that anyone knows of ?

I think there's a site called learnlinux.com or something. There a lot of tutorials out there, but mainly just keep using and it figure it out as you go, and read manuals and guides and hang out in the chat and watch what people talk about to pick stuff up
Also, google fosswire linux cheat sheet
